sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"愉快，快乐，高兴"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: pleasure, delight, rapture, enjoyment, joy, fun
means: pleasure ： 最普通常用词，常指不表露出来的满意或喜悦情绪，也指强烈的愉快或兴奋感。
delight ： 指强烈的、活泼的、显而易见的快乐和高兴。
rapture ： 书面语用词，指极端的欣喜、大喜或狂喜。
enjoyment比pleasure, joy和delight的语气轻，但更着重行为或乐事的本身，而不是感情。
joy ： 语气弱于rapture，强于pleasure，多指情感充溢，喜形于色的强烈的欢乐情绪。
fun ： 普通用词，指任何能给予喜悦的娱乐，或指娱乐本身。

sentence.Network_en: I apologise if your enjoyment of the movie was spoiled.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果破坏了你看电影的兴致，我道歉。

sentence.Network_en: Most patients derive enjoyment from leafing through old picture albums.
sentence.Network_cn: 大多数病人都很喜欢翻看旧相册。

sentence.Network_en: Livy ate the pasties greedily and with huge enjoyment.
sentence.Network_cn: 莉薇津津有味地大口吃着点心。

entry.def: Enjoyment is the feeling of pleasure and satisfaction that you have when you do or experience something that you like.

example.ex: I apologise if your enjoyment of the movie was spoiled.
example.tran: 如果破坏了你看电影的兴致，我道歉。

example.ex: ...her enjoyment of the beauty of the countryside.

means.word_mean: 1. the pleasure felt when having a good time
2. act of receiving pleasure from something
3. (law) the exercise of the legal right to enjoy the benefits of owning property;

sentences.sentence: "we were given the use of his boat"

auth_sentence.content: There's palpable enjoyment in each Charlie Parker piece.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: There's palpable enjoyment in each Charlie Parker piece.

Sentence.sentence: Those who use self-defeating humor,making fun of themselves, of the enjoyment of others, tend to maintain that hostility toward themselves even when alone.

means.word_mean: 愉快,欢乐,满意;令人愉快的事物

sentences.en: Your company adds to the enjoyment of our visit.
sentences.cn: 有您的陪同,我们这次访问更加愉快了。

sentences.en: A large income is not necessary for the full enjoyment of life.
sentences.cn: 要生活得十分愉快不一定要有高收入。

sentences.en: For sheer enjoyment,you can’t beat this game.
sentences.cn: 单以开心来说，没有比这个游戏更好的了。

sentences.en: Food is there to keep you healthy and enhance your enjoyment of life.
sentences.cn: 食物是让人保持健康并增添生活乐趣的。
